items.title: Botox Formulations Differ in Onset, Duration for Frown Lines

items.title: Deupirfenidone Shows Promise Against IPF-Linked Lung Decline
items.description: Tweaking the pirfenidone molecule yields an evidently effective but less toxic antifibrotic drug, investigators say. Medscape Medical News
